name: La Marne - Louvre Museum
author: Benjamin Bardou
description:
**LOUVRE Museum All-in-one pack on Gumroad: [-link removed-](http://)**

**Antoine COYSEVOX**
**(Lyon, 1640 - Paris, 1720)**

**La Marne   **
*Marbre
H. : 2,16 m. ; L. : 1,30 m. ; Pr. : 0,84 m.*

This model is a scan done for the short movie **Gloria Victis**
https://www.artstation.com/artwork/A6doN

Here is the shot done with this scan.
![](https://cdna.artstation.com/p/assets/images/images/003/498/562/large/benjamin-bardou-p020.jpg?1474371120http://)

The model may have misinterpreted faces or holes. 
I scanned the models according to the camera shots.
